title: Mathematics Learning Design Through Social Science Problem-Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Utilization of smartphone-based collaborative tools with a focus on formative assessment-driven operations

learning_goals: Learners can propose solutions to social science problems (e.g., resolving local traffic congestion) by applying mathematical modeling (functions/statistics)
Learners can generate and share learning artifacts (e.g., data charts, calculation processes) using collaborative tools
Learners can optimize problem-solving processes by revising and improving learning artifacts based on peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
